ctx: intros a b p q s H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "T2M (A:=A) (n:=n) a" in H2.

ctx: intros a b p q s H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.tactic: apply (plusP_inv2 a b p q s H3).
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q, s : list (Term A n) H1 : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b H2 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) H3 : plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s Unable to unify "s = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b (pluspf (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q)" with "s = pluspf p q".

ctx: intros a b p q s H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a, b : Term A n p, q, s : list (Term A n) H1 : eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b H2 : zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) H3 : plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) s Unable to unify "{ltT (A:=A) ltM ?M1742 ?M1743} + {ltT (A:=A) ltM ?M1743 ?M1742} + {eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) ?M1742 ?M1743}" with "s = pluspf p q".

original: intros a b p q s H1 H2 H3. rewrite H1 in H2. apply (plusP_inv2 a b p q s H3). apply (ltT_dec A n ltM ltM_dec).
